sect1.title: 抽象类
sect1.para: PHP 5 中引入了抽象类及方法的概念。 An abstract method only declares the method's signature and does not provide an implementation. A class that contains abstract methods needs to be declared abstract.

example.title: 抽象类代码实例
example.programlisting:
<?php
abstract class AbstractClass {
   abstract public function test();
}

class ImplementedClass extends AbstractClass {
   public function test() {
       echo "ImplementedClass::test() called.\n";
   }
}

$o = new ImplementedClass;
$o->test();
?>

sect1.para: 抽象类不能被实例化。Old code that has no user-defined classes or functions named 'abstract' should run without modifications.
